preset_modes: 25 preset modes (e.g. low light, fireworks, night)
settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)

long_exposure: up to 15 minutes with bulb mode

effects: 10 advanced filters (small face, vivid, toy camera, etc.)
sensor_size: 23.5mm x 15.6mm [APS-C] X-Trans CMOS III with primary color filter
